title: Flight Reservation
description: Collects all details specific to a flight reservation.

items.description: Captures all details specific to an individual flight reservation

xdm:agentID.title: Agent ID
xdm:agentID.description: Agent or broker responsible for booking the reservation, if applicable.

xdm:arrivalAirportCode.title: Arrival Airport Code
xdm:arrivalAirportCode.description: Tracks the arrival city airport code.

xdm:departureAirportCode.title: Departure Airport Code
xdm:departureAirportCode.description: Tracks the departure city airport code.

xdm:fareClass.title: Fare Class
xdm:fareClass.description: The fare class of the flight being reserved.

xdm:departureDate.title: Departure Date
xdm:departureDate.description: The departure date of the flight being reserved.

xdm:arrivalDate.title: Arrival Date
xdm:arrivalDate.description: The arrival date of the flight being reserved.

xdm:loyaltyID.title: Loyalty ID
xdm:loyaltyID.description: Includes the loyalty/rewards program ID for the passenger listed in the reservation.

xdm:passengerID.title: Passenger ID
xdm:passengerID.description: Passenger info associated with the reservation.

xdm:salesChannel.title: Sales Channel
xdm:salesChannel.description: Sales channel from which the reservation was booked.

xdm:securityScreening.title: Security Screening
xdm:securityScreening.description: Type of security screening the passenger is subject to.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: The status of the flight reservation.

xdm:cancellation.title: Cancellation
xdm:cancellation.description: Tracked when a reservation has been cancelled.

xdm:created.title: Created
xdm:created.description: Tracked when a reservation has been created.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency Code
xdm:currencyCode.description: Currency code used to make the purchase. ISO 4217 currency code.

xdm:length.title: Length
xdm:length.description: Tracks the total number of days for a reservation.

xdm:modification.title: Modification
xdm:modification.description: Captured when a reservation has been modified.

xdm:modificationDate.title: Modification Date
xdm:modificationDate.description: Tracks when a reservation has been modified.

xdm:numberOfAdults.title: Number of Adults
xdm:numberOfAdults.description: Captures the number of adults associated with the reservation.

xdm:numberOfChildren.title: Number of Children
xdm:numberOfChildren.description: Captures the number of children associated with the reservation.

xdm:purpose.title: Purpose
xdm:purpose.description: Tracks the purpose of the reservation, typically either business or personal.

xdm:tripType.title: Trip Type
xdm:tripType.description: Indicates if the reservation is for a one way, round trip, or multi-city.

xdm:flightCheckIn.description: Flight check in details such as passengers, bags, as well as start, save, failure and complete of check in.

xdm:boardingGroup.title: Boarding Group
xdm:boardingGroup.description: The airline specific indicator of boarding order.

xdm:checkedBags.title: Checked Bags
xdm:checkedBags.description: Tracks the number of bags checked for a flight.

xdm:checkedPassengers.title: Checked Passengers
xdm:checkedPassengers.description: Tracks the number of passengers checked in for a flight, if multiple passengers exist for the same reservation number.

xdm:checkInMethod.title: Check In Method
xdm:checkInMethod.description: Tracks the method used to check in i.e. counter, online, kiosk, or self-service.

xdm:arrivalAirportCode.title: Arrival Airport Code
xdm:arrivalAirportCode.description: Tracks the arrival city airport code.

xdm:departureAirportCode.title: Departure Airport Code
xdm:departureAirportCode.description: Tracks the departure city airport code.

xdm:flightNumber.title: Flight Number
xdm:flightNumber.description: The flight number for the flight being reserved.

xdm:flightStatusSearch.description: Flight status search such as arrival and departure location, date, flight number, and search information.

xdm:searchCount.title: Search Count
xdm:searchCount.description: Incremented when a flight status search occurs.

xdm:flightNumber.title: Flight Number
xdm:flightNumber.description: Captures the flight status search flight number.

xdm:arrivalAirportCode.title: Arrival Airport Code
xdm:arrivalAirportCode.description: Tracks the arrival city airport code.

xdm:departureAirportCode.title: Departure Airport Code
xdm:departureAirportCode.description: Tracks the departure city airport code.

xdm:departureDate.title: Departure Date
xdm:departureDate.description: The departure date of the flight being reserved.
